info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 5 at 11:06AM CDT until April 5 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock AR
info.description:
FFWLZK
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Southern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... East Central Perry County in central Arkansas... Pulaski County in central Arkansas... Eastern Saline County in central Arkansas...
* Until 215 PM CDT.
* At 1106 AM CDT, emergency management reported roads closed and previous water rescues. Thunderstorms were producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 8 and 12 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Little Rock, Conway, North Little Rock, Cabot, Jacksonville. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Conway... Benton... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Southwest Little Rock... Little Rock AFB... Ward... Vilonia... Shannon Hills... Mayflower... Wrightsville... Austin in Lonoke County...
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR LITTLE ROCK, CONWAY, NORTH LITTLE ROCK, CABOT, JACKSONVILLE
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 2:15 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 2:15 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Faulkner, AR; Lonoke, AR; Perry, AR; Pulaski, AR; Saline, AR

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR LITTLE ROCK, CONWAY, NORTH LITTLE ROCK, CABOT, JACKSONVILLE
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 2:15 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 2:15 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
